channel.title: InsidiaX Cache Downloading Problem
channel.description:
[B]Hello.
I am using InsidiaX base, and I can't seem to make the auto cache downloader work. The CacheDownloader downloads the cache, but then, it doesn't unzip it fully. It creates some files and put the zipped cache folder there, but doesn't unzip everything. Then the client gives me a message saying: "Error Loading... Contact Staff!"[/COLOR]
What I did:
I have zipped the FILES inside the cache, not the FOLDER.
It's a .zip file NOT a .rar file.
I have uploaded the .zip file to dropbox.
I have changed all names and paths in Client.java Signlink.java and CacheDownloader.java to the correct ones.
My files:
This is my Cache (on dropbox): [URL=http://"https://dl.dropbox.com/u/29863986/Vengeance-PK.zip"]Vengeance-PK.zip[/URL]
This is my CacheDownloader.java (on dropbox): [URL=http://"https://dl.dropbox.com/u/29863986/CacheDownloader.java"]CacheDownloader.java[/URL]
This is my client.java (on dropbox): [URL=http://"https://dl.dropbox.com/u/29863986/client.java"]client.java[/URL]
This is my signlink.java (on dropbox): [URL=http://"https://dl.dropbox.com/u/29863986/signlink.java"]signlink.java[/URL]
I would appreciate help with this A LOT, so I thank you in advance.
My skype: Alexus777aci-new
[/B]

item.title: InsidiaX Cache Downloading Problem
item.dc:creator: @DispersionSpawn DispersionSpawn
item.description:
@DispersionSpawn wrote:

I am having the same problem it gets to 99% unpacking cache libary and then its say error report to staff. when i look in my c drive it hasnt unpacked properly anyone know how to fix it or have you fix it i could do with a hand

Read full topic
